title: How Krishna Relates Personally with Every Soul? | His Holiness Stoka Krishna Swami
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: Krishna relates with every Jeeva, with every living entity, with every living being.
He has a very specific relationship with each individual Jeeva.
I should be interested in what is my specific relationship with Krishna.
And I should also be aware that Krishna is unlimited.
If He relates with me, it's not that He is absent in some other relationship.
That's the case in the material world.
Like Krishna, He had 16,108 queens in Dwaraka when He incarnated here.
So He was expanding into 16,108 forms.
And nobody is deprived of His association.
We have no experience of some person being unlimited in this material world.
Or even for a matter in the spiritual world,
Krishna is the only unlimited person.
And as the unlimited person, He has unlimited number of forms.
And He expands in those forms and relates with devotees
for the sake of receiving their service.
